TopicTitle: The 'Forum Stats' part of the main page doesn't show what it used to.

Articles.Content: There used to be a bit on the bottom of the main /forum page, where you could see what users are online. I was hoping to see if this mornings release also broke the record for most users online at one time, but I can't see any of that stuff anymore. Just wondering whats up with that? Unless I goofed something up, I cannot see it.
This is because of the high traffic the forum is experiencing. It'll get restored when things quiet down a bit.

![well-this-is-news-meme-generator-well-this-is-exciting-news-isn-t-it-ee32cf.jpg?1403551754.jpg](http://assets.diylol.com/hfs/b27/f51/9e2/resized/well-this-is-news-meme-generator-well-this-is-exciting-news-isn-t-it-ee32cf.jpg?1403551754.jpg)

matter with servers if that coffee is useless for them ; )
Same thing with the viewer counters
